text:
Agolo | New York, NY | Fulltime, Onsite, Visa transfer | NLP and API Engineers

Agolo summaries information faster and with broader coverage than any human. Agolo scans, organizes, and summarizes large amounts of text.

Interview process after applying is a phone screening, onsite technical interview, and executive interview.

Apply on our careers page!

https://www.agolo.com/careers/
